about_the_game:
The Perfect Fusion of Puzzles and History – Embark on an Intellectual Adventure through Ancient Civilizations!

Step into the magnificent worlds of the Maya, Ancient Egypt, and Ancient Greece—three great civilizations that shaped human history and gave rise to remarkable cultural treasures. Through a series of brain-teasing Sudoku challenges, unlock each precious artifact and delve into the fascinating stories behind them. Experience the unique charm of history as you solve puzzles and travel through time.

Game Features

  • 131 Cleverly Designed Sudoku Challenges: From beginner-friendly to high difficulty, each puzzle is a true test of logic and intellect.

  • In-Depth Exploration of Three Great Civilizations: Unlock 27 stunning artifacts and uncover their historical and cultural significance.

  • High-Definition Details: Every artifact is presented in high-quality images, faithfully showcasing its intricate craftsmanship.

  • Detailed Information Display: Artifact descriptions include rich historical background, allowing you to gain a deeper understanding of these precious relics through the game.

Game Highlights

  • Immersive Experience: Travel through history as you solve puzzles and feel the awe-inspiring wonders of ancient civilizations.

  • A Perfect Blend of Fun and Learning: Sharpen your logical thinking while enriching your understanding of history and culture.

  • The Joy of Collecting: Progress through the game to unlock artifacts and build your own collection of cultural treasures.

Are you ready to take on the challenge and uncover the ancient relics hidden within Sudoku puzzles? Relic Sudoku—where puzzle-solving gains deeper meaning!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MAC OS X 10.6.7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo Processor (2GHz or better)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Relic Sudoku

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7 32bit equivalent or better
  • Processor: Intel® i3-3220, AMD FX 6300 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 2400 or higher / NVIDIA 8600M or higher / Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Perfect Fusion of Puzzles and History – Embark on an Intellectual Adventure through Ancient Civilizations!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Indonesian, Japanese*, Thai, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Korean
*languages with full audio support
